itunes:title: Episode 1101 - Four Loko Creator Chris Hunter
title: Episode 1101 - Four Loko Creator Chris Hunter
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Chris Hunter, Four Loko creator and fraternity brother of host Ross Patterson, joins the show to talk about how Four Loko was dreamt up, getting banned by the FDA, being imitated by Jason Sudeikis on Saturday Night Live, and how he went from making drink...
itunes:summary:
Chris Hunter, Four Loko creator and fraternity brother of host Ross Patterson, joins the show to talk about how Four Loko was dreamt up, getting banned by the FDA, being imitated by Jason Sudeikis on Saturday Night Live, and how he went from making drinks in Kappa Sig’s basement at Ohio State to being a booze icon.
